import React, { useEffect,useState } from 'react' import '../../style/Filter.css' import Header from '../Common/Header' export default function Filter() { const[restaurants,setRestarants]=useState([]) const [filter, setFilter] = useState({ city_id:'', cuisine:[], lcost:'', hcost:'', sort:1 }) useEffect(()=>{ fetch('http://localhost:9090/restaurant/filter/1',{ method:'POST', headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}, body:JSON.stringify(filter) }).then(response=>response.json()) .then(data=>{console.log(data);setRestarants(data.data)}) },[filter]) const handleSort=(sort)=>{ filter.sort=sort; setFilter({...filter}) } const handleCost=(lcost,hcost)=>{ filter.lcost=lcost; filter.hcost=hcost; setFilter({...filter}) } const handleCuisine=(e)=>{ if(e.target.checked) filter.cuisine.push(e.target.name) setFilter({...filter}) } return (
Breakfast Places in Mumbai

handleCuisine(e)} /> North Indian

handleCost(0,500)}/> Less than ₹ 500
handleCost(500,1000)}/> ₹ 500 to ₹ 1000
handleCost(1000,1500)}/> ₹ 1000 to ₹ 1500
handleCost(1500,2000)}/> ₹ 1500 to ₹ 2000
handleCost(2000,3000)}/> ₹ 2000 +
Sort
handleSort(1)}/> Price low to high
handleSort(-1)}/> Price high to low

{item.name}
{item.locality}
{item.address}

) }
